feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.0
entry.content:
Note

This version removes SourceForge. - For details on why this was done, see: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/issues/1479#issuecomment-2005689934 - Any existing SourceForge app will switch to using the 'HTML' Source but will no longer work until you make significant changes to its configuration. - For an example of what such changes look like, click this link on a device with Obtainium installed - it imports a SourceForge app added through the HTML Source (Open Camera).

What's Changed

  • Fixes to Spanish translation by @fitojb in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1486
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1502
  • Added 'Share new Apps with AppVerifier' (#255)
  • Removed SourceForge (#1487)
  • Delete downloaded APK on install fail (#1495)
  • Fix GitLab's broken track-only mode (#1496)
  • Auto-delete download if likely invalid (#1498)

New Contributors

  • @fitojb made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1486

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.0.6...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update vi.json by @ngocanhtve in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1503
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1516:
  • Add support for GitLab CI artifact links in releases (#1506)
  • Improve load speed on return to foreground

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix out of bounds array access in GeneratedForm update by @gepbird in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1532
  • Update de.json by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1529
  • Update hu.json by @gidano in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1525

New Contributors

  • @gepbird made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1532

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fastlane: i18n ru for app description by @yurtpage in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1543
  • Corrects french translations by @o101010 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1540
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1544:
  • Don't trust content-length header from sites w/o accept-ranges support (#1542) + bugfixes
  • Allow for spaces in HTML link and version filters (#1537)

New Contributors

  • @yurtpage made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1543
  • @o101010 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1540

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4
